Introduction

NXD, also known as NeXt iDentity, is an upcoming three-member boy group under RBW. NXD consists of Jaemin, Hyeonggeun, and Daehyun.

Before debut, the members were unveiled through RBW's first family concert "RBW 2023 Summer Fes ~Over The Rainbow~." They released the pre-debut single "Jump" on April 18, 2024.

On October 31st, 2024, RBW announced that Hiroto and Yongjoon have left the group and a new lineup will be set.
